Gumdrop
  • All Classes
 

Uses of Package
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp

  • Packages that use org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp 
    Package Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp
    FTP (File Transfer Protocol) server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp.file
    Filesystem-based FTP handler implementations.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp 
    Class Description
    FTPAuthenticationResult
    Defines the possible outcomes for FTP authentication attempts.
    FTPConnection
    Connection handler for the FTP protocol.
    FTPConnectionHandler
    Handler interface for FTP connection events and business logic.
    FTPConnectionHandlerFactory
    A factory interface for creating FTPConnectionHandler instances.
    FTPConnectionMetadata
    Provides comprehensive metadata about an active FTP connection.
    FTPConnectionMetadata.FTPTransferMode
    Transfer modes for FTP data connections.
    FTPConnectionMetadata.FTPTransferType
    Transfer types for FTP data representation.
    FTPDataConnection
    Connection handler for FTP data connections.
    FTPDataConnectionCoordinator
    Coordinates data connections between FTP control connections and data transfers.
    FTPDataConnectionCoordinator.DataConnectionMode
    Data connection modes
    FTPDataConnectionCoordinator.PendingTransfer
    Represents a pending data transfer operation
    FTPDataConnectionCoordinator.TransferType
    Data transfer types
    FTPFileInfo
    Represents metadata about a file or directory in the FTP file system.
    FTPFileOperationResult
    Defines the possible outcomes for FTP file and directory operations.
    FTPFileSystem
    Abstract interface for FTP file system operations.
    FTPFileSystem.DirectoryChangeResult
    Result of a directory change operation.
    FTPFileSystem.UniqueNameResult
    Result of a unique name generation operation.
    FTPOperation
    Categories of FTP operations for authorization purposes.
    FTPServer
    Connection factory for FTP control connections on a given port.
    FTPServerMetrics
    OpenTelemetry metrics for FTP servers.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp.file 
    Class Description
    FTPAuthenticationResult
    Defines the possible outcomes for FTP authentication attempts.
    FTPConnectionHandler
    Handler interface for FTP connection events and business logic.
    FTPConnectionHandlerFactory
    A factory interface for creating FTPConnectionHandler instances.
    FTPConnectionMetadata
    Provides comprehensive metadata about an active FTP connection.
    FTPFileInfo
    Represents metadata about a file or directory in the FTP file system.
    FTPFileOperationResult
    Defines the possible outcomes for FTP file and directory operations.
    FTPFileSystem
    Abstract interface for FTP file system operations.
    FTPFileSystem.DirectoryChangeResult
    Result of a directory change operation.
    FTPFileSystem.UniqueNameResult
    Result of a unique name generation operation.
    FTPOperation
    Categories of FTP operations for authorization purposes.
